name: Dauphine Organics - NatCera™ Advanced Ceramide Complex (V)
description: Dauphine Organics offers NatCera™ Advanced Ceramide Complex (V) - a plant-based, skin-identical barrier repair system. Restores and strengthens natural barrier with vegan formulation. Ideal for natural and vegan cosmetics requiring comprehensive barrier support. Plant-based ceramides mimic natural skin lipids without animal-derived ingredients.
notes: Plant-based, skin-identical ceramide complex. Restores and strengthens natural barrier without animal-derived ingredients. Vegan formulation appeals to clean beauty and ethical consumers. NatCera™ brand suggests advanced technology and efficacy. Ideal for natural and vegan cosmetic formulations.
